column5: Fished Upper Buckhorn last Wednesday and had a good day with my boy and brother. He used worms/minnows on a jig and was busy all day. Enjoy the pics  A nice bass for him    20" largie for me.    My brother caught this 38"    I guess I had the luckiest day with this 42" that cleared the water 3 times. Thanks for reading.

Well done !!! And it's even better when you have your son with you !!! He will remember that forever and I'm sure he will be a fisherman too dad !!! Nice catch for the both of you !!!! Thanks for sharing !!!    Cheers
Congrats on a great day out with the boss looks like it was a great day
Nice fish , nice pictures and your sons smile says it all . Tell your son I like his hoody
Nice day on the water.  Could of got more:)
Back to buckhorn tomorrow.  Hopefully we get a couple nibbles.
Good luck looking forward to your report and pictures of that 50" er
Jigs and worms....a true classic!  Good share!
Looks like  a nice day!    Glad you can get your son away from Minecraft for a day of fishing, lol!
